ygData.subject: Re: Survey and Screenshot Taking- Meeting kakis , no GF, no Life, no money.
ygData.msgSnippet: Hahahah, I noticed u add no GF, no life and no money in the subject, ;) ... day. Ya, EQ emphasise much more in team work than UO, teaming with lousy players
ygData.messageBody:
Hahahah, I noticed u add "no GF, no life and no money" in the subject, ;)

> EQ is a group game. when u get to group with assholes, its spolits the
day.

Ya, EQ emphasise much more in team work than UO, teaming with lousy players
can be a waste of time. I guess if I can't get a good team, I will go
butcher block solo fighting skeletons ;(

> On the long run, we need to built parthership and play with ppl we know.
> That could be diff somtimes when:
> 1) ppl u know and play with doent log-in at the same time as u do.They r
> leaving when u just log in, or vice-vesa.
> 2) Level differences.
> 3) Location diff. Freeport, Qeynos etc.some of us r more comfortable
playing
> at our starting location than to emigate to a diff city. or at lower lvl,
we
> do not have the confident to venture out just yet.

I think Leshrec found an easy way to go Freeport from GFaydark. I hope to
meet him soon and go hunting together.

> I hope the numbers of Singapore EQ player pool grows. It will be good for
> all
> singapore players. Most nite im on, i saw lotsa Japanese players grouping
> together in
> Freeport. I dont get invit or they wont join u becos they convers in Jap.
> WE NEED MORE SINGPORE PLAYERS IN INNORUUK SERVER! NOW !

Hehe, how abt HK players? I met aquite a few of them in DFaydark, and 1
Jap player (Satoru) so far, they r quite nice and good players.

> Lets gather and meet.
> HOW About this Saturday? 28th May
> After dinner?
> b4 dinner
> 3:00pm?
> 7:00pm?

Sat most probably I can only login after late afternoon, but tonight is
Friday night, I guess I will play until morning lah, hahahah. I normally
login after 9~10pm, that's the time I reach home from work. Normally I dun
see many local kakis at that time, except Les, & Yiyang. Due to work, I
can only play latest till 1.30am on weekdays...;(

> Saturday a bit crowded but not as bad as sunday.
> Forget your girlfriends. U got EQ. what u need GF for???? (Dont ANSWER)

Hehe...

> Im Lvl 13 now, want to make 15 this weekend but i dont care. we can still
> play together.
> If u r lvl 8-10 , i group with u and fight monsters, b4 monster dies. i
> ungroup and u get MORE exp 8-) (wink wink, blink blink)

Wah, like tat also can meh? If u group with lower lvl player, won't u get
more xp? May I know if u and another un-group player hunt a monster, he
did 60% dam, u did 40%, regardless of who kill the monster, he still got
the loot priority over u right (since he did more dam)? How abt XP? If
the high lvl player did more dam and get the kill, will the lower lvl
player get xp for the 40% dam he made?
If can help like tat, pls help me leh, been stucked at lvl 8 for almost a
week. ;)

> Let me know the time guys.
> I'll try to met ya.
> maybe freeport or Rivervale. Rivervale is in "between" Qeynos and
> Freport.
> Meet for hunt and Screenshoot.(im most likely be running naked among the
> trees)

How abt 11pm tonight? I need to work late tonight. If I can login early,
I will search for u guys.

> Gary, u the old bird. could u lead the guys from rivervale to Freeport ,
or
> Freeport to Rivervale?
> Lets work out something. SOON.

Lead me from Felwithe to Freeport also ;)

> YiYang of Innoruuk
> Monk'eying around FreePort(naked)
>
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Date: Friday, May 28, 1999 9:41 AM
> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Survey and Screenshot Taking
>
>
> >From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> >I'm kinda stucked at lvl 8 with no reliable kakis to team with. Team
with
> >a lvl 6 ranger, lvl 6 cleric and a lvl 7 bard last night in CB
(crashbone
> >lair lah, not chxx bxx). B4 the fight tat cleric so ya ya (he is so
> >confident that he make his char a pk char when he started off). Keep
> >telling me he is very solid, can fight, can heal and cast spell. The
bard
> >also ya ya, say she always solo at CB entrance (but she really got a
kick
> >ass axe from divnn). In the end when we crashed with a train of 5 orc
cen,
> >bard disband and flee herself. Cleric kena killed very fast (too
confident
> >that he charge whenever he see orc, even I keep asking him to let the
rest
> >heal/med 1st). In the end he is the 1st one who kena killed and restart
> >back in Felwithe. After he run to CB entrance, got killed by orc again
b4
> >he finish looting his corpse, and this thing happened ard 3~4, sigh.
The
> >ranger is quite ok, he always try to help, but I guess he is not familar
> >with the area and dunno how to use zone to stay alive when the opponents
> >are too strong, in the end he also died 3 times. I myself left solo
alone
> >and earn xp for them, by using travelling across zone to keep myself
alive.
> > After 1.5 hrs of hunting, I also quite sian and logout liao.
> >
> >Didnt get to meet Les last night, so dunno how to go freeport. Anyone
play
> >in GFaydark wanna team with me?
> >
